adDetails: I'd love to host your dog next time you go out of town! To contact me, copy and paste this link into your browser: http://roverdogstay.com/sit/bespoiled/c Or simply call me at show contact info Get $20 off your first stay by using the coupon code BESPOILED120. First-time Rover customers only. About Me: A responsible dog owner and you can rest assured that your 'furry-four-footed friend' will have my undivided attention. I am a full-time housewife and a forever mom to our cocker-mix. I am a former, volunteer photographer for adoptables at the Monterey SPCA -- my love for man's best friend is without question. Our house is located in a nice and dog-friendly neighborhood - ideal for dog walks and three blocks from the beach -- a short drive to Frederick St. Dog Park. About My Services:: My rate is $29 per night. I prefer to sit the following sizes of dogs: Small breeds - (1-15 lbs.), medium (15-35 lbs.) Call for a meet and greet. We look forward to meeting you and your precious pet!
